item.title: Minimum Web App Terraform Skeleton [English]
item.description: I made a Skeleton for Terraform code. Basically I’m supposed to use it for future projects, but then just thought it might be useful for others so that want to share it with you. Also I tried to avoid having to copy and paste codes when deploye in multiple environments for same app. Hopefully, you will be able to reuse at least a part or an idea to help you with your work.
